text: Trainer
Trainer
Trainer
Trainer

──Five, six, seven, eight!
No, no, way too slow!
...pant, pant...

Right now, everyone is all over the place,
making small mistakes here and there.

What you can't do in the practice room,
you definitely can't do on stage.

Well then, that's it for today's lesson!
Good job, everyone!

Thank you very much / Thank you very much / 
Thank you very much...!/ Thank you very much~

──Oh, everyone looks tired!
Did practice just finish?
Huh?

Aha~
could it be snacks?

Haha, sorry,
it's not snacks today.
──This...
...T-This is...

For the unit live, it seemed like everyone
was having trouble coming up with ideas, so...

I put together a tentative schedule
and various sets and arrangements.

Oh, wow~!
Ah, this is cute~!
Hmm...

Of course, I can't guarantee that all the
proposed ideas will be implemented, but...

I want to incorporate everyone's opinions as much
as possible and make it a 'unit live' to convey that to the fans.
